title: 'A wonderful miracle' - how Messi & Beckham made Miami shine
subtitle: In the world of team sport, no-one adores the achievements of its most accomplished individuals more than America's sports-mad fans, writes Guillem Balague.
full_text: In the world of team sport, no-one adores the achievements of its most accomplished individuals more than America's sports-mad fans, writes Guillem Balague.
